title: MEASURES WE TAKE TO SAFEGUARD YOUR INFORMATION:
description: To ensure the protection and security of your personal information, we have instituted the following measures:
measures: Restricting the collection of personal information to only essential details.
Establishing comprehensive security policies and procedures.
Mandating confidentiality agreements for our employees.
Deploying and overseeing intrusion prevention and detection systems.
Conducting regular due diligence of vendors.
